Title
- Concise, descriptive title (scope: short summary)

Summary
- What changed and why? One or two sentences.

Scope
- Pages/areas touched (e.g., mkdocs.yml, docs/*)
- Breaking changes? No/Yes (explain)

How to Review
- Key things to check (links, rendering, structure)
- Screenshots or before/after (if UI changes)

Checklist
- [ ] Content accurate and concise
- [ ] Internal links valid (relative paths)
- [ ] Images in `docs/assets/` with alt text
- [ ] Navigation updated (mkdocs.yml) if new/relocated pages
- [ ] CI passes (build + link check)

Related
- Closes #<issue> (if applicable)
